Text:
iv'e downloaded and watched this.
the subtitle is 5 sec advance but i used KMPlayer to resync so its fine. there are some flickering ive noticed. maybe two times but only for 1 sec.
other than that the quality is superior.
A10/V10.

This worked like Shit for me It tiled in the first 10 to 15 mn and the audio sounded like it was recorded while someone was pointing a cam at the movie theater screen if it didnt tile that actually would've been a nice upload.
